CONDITION DESCRIPTION: Rheumatoid arthritis, other inflammatory polyarthropathies & systematic connective tissue disorders
PROVENANCE: Developed by Dr Duncan Edwards  in 2015 based on an ISD list of rheumatoid arthritis as previous published lists were not specific and overestimated the prevalence of RA.
CITATIONS: Nicholson A, Ford E, Davies KA et al. Optimising use of electronic health records to describe the presentation of rheumatoid arthritis in primary care: a strategy for developing code lists. PLoS One 2013;8(2):e54878.
